name: HC SNT DRACONES - Woodcut on Mingeishi Paper
description: This hand made woodcut print on Awagami Mingeishi was created to accompany an interactive installation project. HC SVNT DRACONES, by Scott Horn and Charlie Campbell is inspired by 1980s Japanese role playing games. Its participants collaborated in hours-long, turn-based combat against the dragon depicted in this print. Each print is sold unframed in a protective polypropylene bag with an acid and lignen-free, archival card backing. Prints are either sold from the edition of 44 or as an artist's proof. The artist's proofs may vary in quality, contain smudges, or other slight imperfections. This print is 9.5 x 12.5" and fits nicely floating in an 11 x 14" frame.
